name: SintLucas dating simulator
description:
The best dating sim ever!

Meet SintLucas Dating Sim, the game that allows you to date that hot teacher you keep dreaming about! Or, of course, go talk to the students and keep being the vanilla person you are.

No matter what your choice is, SLDS will make your dating standards rise by 200%. All characters have an eccentric personality and some of them might be very into you (who knows?). 

We care about your personal interests! You like edgy boys? We have it! Nerd girls? 100%! That one teacher that looks super handsome? Yes, Kevin is in the game, don't worry!

Anyway, what are you waiting for? Go play it!
